name: Fly Lightly
description:
Synopys

To escape a terrible war on the ground, Timmy and his friends decided to fly to a safe place situated 5000 meters further away.

It won't be an easy task.

Timmy will have to take care of the crew to reach the ultimate goal !
Sadly, another totally innocent specie, the others, will try to get on your ship. 

Sacrifices must be made.

It's you, or them...

Controls
  • Move : Left & Right arrows
  • Jump : Space bar
  • Action : E
Team
  • Developers : Jean-Christophe Joubier, Vincent Blot
  • 2D Artist : Antoine Aumont
Notes

We didn't have a MacOS or Linux environment to test if the respective build works.
